ovdesc.p: Holds status of TSA service agents

desc.p: This field tells in which stage of job processing we are in.
Can hold the below values.
1=Processing Contracts
2=Selecting Contracts
3=Managing Control List
4=Selecting list file
5=Managing Batch record (in S.JOB.RUN)
6=Waiting on list record
7=Processing Single threaded
Number of Deletes performed in this session. It is taken from SYSTEM(1027)
Number of Inputs performed in this session. It is taken from SYSTEM(1027)
This field contains the service that has been scheduled to run by the agent next.
Number of Reads performed in this session. It is taken from SYSTEM(1027)
This field contains the service that is being run currently by the agent.
The process id of the current agent. This field contains the unique reference of the process that has been initiated by the current agent.
This field stores the jBASE port number on which the service agent is running.
This field is updated by the Service Manager.This field holds the last output from the COMO.
Gets updated when LAST.CONTACT time is updated.
Number of Executes performed in this session. It is taken from SYSTEM(1027)
The server on which the service Agent is running. This will be a valid server name in the system.
Key to the TSA.STATUS record.
Key is the service agent number.
Upto 10 charactes
The status of the current agent. This will store whether the agent is running of whether it has stopped.
Number of Clear files performed in this session. It is taken from SYSTEM(1027)
This field holds the como name of the current agent.
Upto 30 character
Number of Opens performed in this session. It is taken from SYSTEM(1027)
Number of Writes performed in this session. It is taken from SYSTEM(1027)
This field is updated by the Service Manager. This contains the last time a contact was made by the system to this agent.
The T24 Session Id generated unique to the session. This field contains the ID of T24.SESSION
Memory used in this session. It is taken from SYSTEM(1027)
